content: I haven't been everywhere, but it's on my list.
author: Susan Sontag

content: When preparing to travel, lay out all your clothes and all your money. Then take half the clothes and twice the money.
author: Susan Heller

content: Can we just skip to the part of my life where I travel the world?
author: Unknown

content: I want someone to look at me the way I look at a travel magazine.
author: Unknown

content: I've been to almost as many places as my luggage.
author: Bob Hope

content: Travel becomes a strategy for accumulating photographs.
author: Susan Sontag

content: Remember that happiness is a way of travel - not a destination
author: Roy M. Goodman

content: We travel, some of us forever, to seek other states, other lives, other souls.
author: Anais Nin
